# polytomic_gsheets_connection (Data Source)

Google Sheets Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_gsheets_connection" "gsheets" {
  id = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```
